inclusion.criterion: The mother does not have a chronic disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The mother's not using antibiotic drugs during pregnancy and postpartum period
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Scoring 10 points below the Beck Depression Inventory
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Smoking of the woman during pregnancy and postpartum period
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: The absence of Intrauterine Growth Retardation (IUGR) or genetic disease in the newborn
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Birth weight is in the range of 2500-4000 gr
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No gastrointestinal disease in the newborn
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Having problems with the breast in the mother
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The mother is using probiotics / antibiotics before randomization and during her pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with the complaint of empty scrotum at the right side. The baby boy is a first child who was born at the age of 38 weeks with NVD from a healthy mother.
